definition: archaic variant of 蘇|苏[su1]/to revive
The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
pinyin: Ye1 su1 Ji1 du1 Hou4 qi1 Sheng4 tu2 Jiao4 hui4
containing_words.word: 耶穌基督後期聖徒教會

definition: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
pinyin: Ye1 su1 Ji1 du1 Mo4 shi4 Sheng4 tu2 Jiao4 hui4
containing_words.word: 耶穌基督末世聖徒教會

sentences.english: Christians believe Jesus Christ was buried where the Church of the Holy Sepulchre now stands in Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 基督徒們相信耶穌基督就是被葬在了這座聖墓教堂下。

sentences.english: Christians celebrate the resurrection of Christ from the death.
sentences.chinese: 基督教徒們慶祝耶穌基督的復活。

sentences.english: MissionThe mission of the EV Ministry is to spread the good news of Jesus Christ.
sentences.chinese: 福傳委員會的使命是要傳揚主耶穌基督救恩的好訊息。

sentences.english: Jesus Christ the same yesterday, and to day, and for ever.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌基督，昨日今日一直到永遠是一樣的。

sentences.english: What Christology is, is what do you believe about the nature of Jesus Christ?
sentences.chinese: 基督論就是，你認爲耶穌基督的本質是什麼？

sentences.english: The believers at Colosse had faith in Jesus Christ.
sentences.chinese: 歌羅西的信徒對耶穌基督有信心。

sentences.english: The blood of Jesus Christ not only redeems us, it justifies us.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌基督的寶血不單拯救我們，也赦免了我們的罪。

sentences.english: Joy, joy, for Christ is born, The Babe, the Son of Mary.
sentences.chinese: 爲耶穌基督的誕生而喜悅，聖母瑪麗之子。

sentences.english: Thank You for giving me rest for my soul and peace in my heart today. In Jesus' Name.
sentences.chinese: 這樣感謝禱告，都是奉靠耶穌基督的名求。

sentences.english: Jesus my Lord came down to earth.
You must submit to the lordship of Jesus Christ.
sentences.chinese: 你必須順服耶穌基督的主權。

sentences.english: Men that have hazarded their lives for the name of our Lord Jesus Christ.
sentences.chinese: 這二人是爲我主耶穌基督的名不顧性命的。

sentences.english: That reminds me of the Lord Jesus Christ.
sentences.chinese: 這使我想起了主耶穌基督。

sentences.english: All of this was only the prefiguring of the cross of Christ.
sentences.chinese: 這一切只不過是預表著耶穌基督的十字架。

sentences.english: Chritmas is the day that Jesus Christ was born.
sentences.chinese: 聖誕節這一天，是耶穌基督誕生的日子。

sentences.english: For all seek their own, not the things which are Jesus Christ's.
sentences.chinese: 別人都求自己的事，並不求耶穌基督的事。

definition: Holy Father/God the Father (in the Christian Trinity)
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
feudal term of praise for ruler, king or emperor/general term for saint in former times/term for God during the Taiping Heavenly Kingdom 太平天國|太平天国/Holy Spirit (in Christian Trinity)
tabernacle (biblical word for a meeting hall or tent)
Abraham (name)/Abraham, father of Judaism and Islam in the Bible and Quran/same as Ibrahim 易卜拉辛
Holy Son/Jesus Christ/God the Son (in the Christian Trinity)
